tool_description: Passionate about sports betting? Tipsxpert.com provides your daily free betting tips and a collection of the best free bets !
name: Football betting tips
title: Football betting tips

api_list.name: /betting-tips
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://scommetix-football-betting-tips-v1.p.rapidapi.com/betting-tips"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "scommetix-football-betting-tips-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
